query:
SELECT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                FROM hosts h
                LEFT JOIN organization_member_metadata om
                    ON om.organization_id = h.shared_with_organization_id
                    AND om.user_id = $2
                WHERE h.id = $1
                  AND (h.owner_user_id = $2 OR om.user_id IS NOT NULL)
            ) AS "allowed!"
